about_the_game:
True Dino Terror!

Fossilfuel 2 picks up four years after the original game. You assume the role of PMC Alpha Mercenary Jack Allen, as his team investigates the remains of the Sierra Research Facility in Alaska.

What is in the Demo.

Embark on an adrenaline-pumping journey within the demo, where you'll explore the opening section of the enigmatic Sierra base. Brace yourself for thrilling encounters with a variety of prehistoric giants, and get a sneak peek at the arsenal and combat dynamics that await you in Fossilfuel 2! The demo will feature roughly 30 to 60 minutes of the game and give players a taste of things to come.

Feedback is welcomed!


This Demo isn't just about you trying Fossilfuel 2; it's about us creating the best experience together. Share your thoughts, suggestions, and critiques on the Steam forums, or join the Discord community. Highlight the aspects you find compelling and the areas you believe need improvement. Your feedback plays a pivotal role in shaping the evolution of Fossilfuel 2.

Demo Ranking:


At the end of the Demo players will be given a rank based on the below.

S - Beat the Demo without saving and in 15 minutes OR kill the Spinosaurus.
A - Beat the Demo in under 20 minutes.
B - Beat the Demo in under 25 minutes.
C - Beat the Demo in under 30 minutes.
D- A time over 30 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: The game features big scary dinosaurs that eat people, with big scary guns.

name: Fossilfuel 2 Demo
short_description: Escape a massive megalodon, blast raptors with a magnesium-loaded shotgun, and meet terrifying foes in this thrilling preview of Fossilfuel 2!
